item.description:
Sorry for the delay everyone! It has been "one of those months"... Who knew?

Well, I picked the restaurant for April 13th's event, Audrey's Restaurant at Johnson & Wales Inn in Seekonk, MA. I know it is about 15 minutes outside Providence, but I didn't think it was too far out of the way.

We will be meeting at 11am to allow us late sleepers a few more minutes shut-eye. Brunch is served until 1pm, served buffet style and is $12.95 per person.

I look forward to seeing everyone that day.

Yay brunch!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the front. I am the one in my piccy with the red hair ;-)
item.why: We have a good time talking and enjoying good food!
item.name: RI Brunch Bunch- April Meetup- Johnson & Wales Inn
